Params: {3: "The show has ended, and the night has sunk deep. It's time for farewells."}
{3: 'The evening breeze grazes streets with scattered lights, past the dancing shadows of trees that rustle softly in response.'}
{3: "Beneath the artificial stars, Selena's skirt flutters in an elegant arc gently in the breeze, like a flower bud ready to bloom, or waves splashing against the shore."}
{3: "Tonight's moonlight is hazy and dreamlike. It feels like a waste to end your time together like this."}
{3: "But... this seems to be the usual plot in all the plays she's read."}
{3: "Juliet loves Romeo deeply, but she remains calm and reserved. When it's time to part, she turns away with grace, quietly awaiting the dawn."}
{3: "But what if she doesn't want to be calm and reserved anymore?"}
{3: 'Selena is startled by this thought. Her heartbeat quickens.'}
{3: 'She lowers her head to hide her embarrassment. She hides her reddening face behind her hair and turns around before speaking again.'}
{3: 'She freezes when she lifts her head.'}
{3: "She sees that the other person hasn't moved an inch."}
{3: "Her beloved stands quietly at her doorstep even after saying goodbye, still gazing at her. Selena's mind goes completely blank."}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Just one more thing, I truly am grateful that you followed my voice here...', 18: '100008950'}
{3: 'She tries to ignore the flutter in her heart, yet her parched lips can only produce meaningless excuses.'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "Without you, I might've stayed lost in that half-empty shell of a memory, never seen again...", 18: '100008951'}
{3: "No, she didn't mean to say something so shallow, but that person had probably already guessed her true feelings."}
{2: 'Selena', 3: '...Conductor, could you stay a little longer?', 18: '100008952'}
{3: 'Her racing heart makes her body act before reason takes over.'}
{3: "Selena gently tugs at the person's sleeve. She abandons the reserve that has bound her until now."}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Just like how you stood close to me just now... I want to be close to you too.', 18: '100008953'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "Promise me, tomorrow, the day after, or in some distant future, you'll stay by my side, just like today.", 18: '100008954'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "We've already lost so much time... From now on, I want to hold onto every second with you.", 18: '100008955'}
{2: 'All of that is behind us now.', 3: '114'}
{3: 'Selena lets out a soft sigh of relief, her heart growing calmer.'}
{3: 'Her fingers brush past her hair as she removes the iris that has always been there.'}
{3: 'Under the glow of the street lamps, tiny specks of light reflect off the crown of the iris.'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "It's not much of a reward, but... I still want you to have it.", 18: '100008958'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'I hope... this can be my way of staying by your side.', 18: '100008959'}
{3: 'She trembles at the unexpected touch, but soon decides to respond to it.'}
{3: 'Your hand moves through her silken hair, leaving the warmth of your touch upon her face.'}
{2: 'Sorry, that was probably a bit sudden.', 3: '155'}
{2: 'But I want you to know that you belong right here.', 3: '156'}
{2: "Don't be afraid. We'll get through every challenge together.", 3: '157'}
{2: 'I will never leave you alone again, Selena.', 3: '158'}
{3: 'She carefully holds onto this warmth, burying her cheek into your hand.'}
{1: '1', 2: "<color=#06414Dff><size=50>No matter how far apart we are,\\n\\nI'll carry these words with me, always.</size></color>", 3: '-265', 4: '50'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "No matter how far apart we are, I'll carry these words with me, always.", 18: '100008962'}
{1: '1', 2: '<color=#06414Dff><size=50>With your promise,\\n\\nI will never again be lost in endless darkness.</size></color>', 3: '-250', 4: '50'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "As long as I have your promise, I won't be lost in the dark again.", 18: '100008963'}
{3: 'After repeated tests show that her frame is safe and her M.I.N.D. stable, Selena is finally allowed to join the Task Force for simple surface missions.'}
{3: 'Selena softly sighs when her feet touch the soil once more.'}
{3: 'She never thought she would set foot on this blue planet again.'}
{3: 'Wild vines creep across crumbling walls soaked by Red Tide. This place has been deserted for so long, not even birds fly here anymore.'}
{3: 'Withered yellow grass snaps under heavy metal boots. The boots stop moving for a moment in front of this abandoned, dilapidated theater.'}
{3: 'The red-haired woman seems to sense something. She extends her fingers to touch the wind.'}
{3: "She weaves the currents of wind with a conductor's baton, playing a melody that belongs to time itself."}
{3: 'After finishing work, Selena sits upright in her tent in the conservation area.'}
{3: 'She dips her fountain pen in royal blue ink and ponders for a moment before writing the first line of her letter.'}
{3: "Her thoughts are still forming and the silver pen tip pauses. Selena furrows her brow when she notices a shift in the wind's direction."}
{3: 'She hears the sound of "time" and "information" blurring together and jarring notes being played...'}
{3: 'Having finished their tasks, the Gray Raven Commandant is sound asleep.'}
{3: 'No one notices as the iris placed on the desk turns transparent before dissolving into specks of light and fading away.'}
{3: 'And the entire world is also about to be nurtured and reborn in this darkness, reborn anew.'}
{1: '3', 2: '<color=#ffffffff><size=45>Days since the completion of "The New Earth Codex": ▁▅▃▃▅</size></color>', 4: '-50'}
